data.pageDescription: Explore a collection of blog articles written by Michel Murabito, sharing insights, experiences, and knowledge on various topics. Dive into the world of platform engineering, cloud-native technologies, and more.

workPerformed.name: Compose GenAI Apps: May the Force Be with Your Data and Models
workPerformed.description:
A very short time ago, in a nearby galaxy (practically here and now), the force that pervades the universe encountered and connected composable architectures with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Their synergy promises to revolutionize the development of Gen-AI applications, transforming months of work into just hours. In this talk, we will explore how modern ML/AI technologies, applied to real-world scenarios, can benefit from a composable approach to quickly address complex needs with contextualized and updated data.

We will discuss the challenges related to the implementation of these scalable solutions and the crucial role of Platform Engineering in reducing complexity and accelerating innovation. We will explore how the power of advanced architectures and platform engineering strategies can radically transform the landscape of “intelligent application” development.

resources.title: Compose GenAI Apps: May the Force Be with Your Data and Models
resources.description: Online

workPerformed.name: How to turn Cognitive Load into creativity
workPerformed.description: We will dive into the dynamic field of platform engineering, a driving force in reducing cognitive load and increasing developer productivity. Through a series of fascinating case studies, we will explore concrete examples that demonstrate the significant impact of these practices on daily operations. We will place particular emphasis on new tools and technologies, which are at the forefront of this revolution. The talk will also include innovative methods for evaluating the effectiveness of platform engineering, providing concrete strategies to enhance productivity in the workflow. Join us to discover the potential of platform engineering in reshaping the software development landscape.

resources.title: How to turn Cognitive Load into creativity
resources.description: Online

workPerformed.name: Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io
workPerformed.description: We will explore how Buildpacks.io can transform the way developers build, deploy, and manage applications in a cloud-native environment. We'll discuss the core concepts of buildpacks, their role in simplifying the build process, and how they enhance developer productivity by automating the creation of production-ready container images. Attendees will gain insights into best practices for integrating Buildpacks.io into their development workflows and see real-world examples of its impact on accelerating application delivery. Join us to discover how Buildpacks.io can empower your cloud-native development journey.

resources.title: Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io
resources.description: Paris, France

workPerformed.name: Platform Engineering: DevX nel paese delle meraviglie
workPerformed.description: With the goal of constantly improving the developer experience and increasing the productivity of development teams, Platform Engineering creates toolchains and workflows that enable self-service capabilities, reducing complexity and uncertainty in the software development and deployment phases. Together with Michel Murabito, we will explore the key concepts of Platform Engineering, its benefits, and how it can radically transform the approach to developing and managing applications in a cloud-native environment, thereby improving the overall efficiency of the team.

resources.title: Platform Engineering: DevX nel paese delle meraviglie
resources.description: Online

workPerformed.name: Highlights from KubeCon Europe 2024
workPerformed.description: In this panel discussion we talked about the key takeaways from the event, covering its main content, emerging trends, and notable events. The session provided an in-depth overview of the latest developments in the Kubernetes ecosystem, sharing insights on the most significant presentations and discussions from KubeCon Europe 2024. It was an informative session that highlighted the evolving landscape of Kubernetes and its community.

resources.title: Highlights from KubeCon Europe 2024
resources.description: London, UK

workPerformed.name: Un Viaggio nell'Universo della Developer Experience
workPerformed.description: In the realm of software development, Developer Experience (DX) is crucial yet often underestimated. DX measures the comfort, productivity, and satisfaction programmers feel when working with tools, libraries, and frameworks. A positive DX leads to increased productivity, improved code quality, and higher talent retention. Join Michel Murabito in his session 'A Journey into the Universe of Developer Experience' to explore how enhancing DX can transform the development process, making it more efficient and enjoyable

resources.title: Un Viaggio nell'Universo della Developer Experience
resources.description: Online
